definitions.definition: the position of somebody/something on a scale that shows how good or important they are in relation to other similar people or things, especially in sport

examples.text: He has improved his ranking this season from 67th to 30th.
She has retained her No.1 world ranking.
The product has consistently been given a high ranking by consumer groups.

definitions.definition: an official list showing the best players of a particular sport in order of how successful they are

examples.text: He is currently 16th in the world rankings.
